sectionHeader.title: Why WattWizards?
sectionHeader.description: We are a team that combines software science and electricity to produce digital solutions to facilitate many complex mathematical operations in the field of electricity. Our team consists of electrical engineers, mobile and web application developers, as well as people working in entrepreneurship and business.

community.title: WattWizards Community
community.description: We have created a community for ourselves, which includes many sciences such as software science and electricity under one roof to provide digital solutions.

features.title: Creating a community specialized in the field of electricity
features.description: Our project has been approved by the Academy of Scientific Research - Department of Software and Computer Systems.

platform.title: WattWizards Presents
platform.description: WattWizards offers a platform that simplifies complex concepts in electricity and software science, breaking down technical jargon to make advanced theories accessible to both learners and professionals.
